topic.title: Configure Foreman Server
topic.shortdesc: If the provisioning interface on the provisioned host is not the first interface returned in the puppet data, Foreman will overwrite the configuration in the database. This can cause issues later.

body.p: To prevent Foreman from changing the IP and MAC information to reflect the puppet data, change the ignore_puppet_facts_for_provisioning setting

ol.li: Log into the Foreman user interface.
Move the mouse over the Administer drop down menu on the right side of the interface.

Select Value for the ignore_puppet_facts_for_provisioning setting.
Change this setting to true.
